item.title: Facebook Messenger
item.description: Overview # After logging onto SeaChat, you can navigate to “Agent Configuration” -> “Channels” -> “Messenger” to add the integration. Stay tuned! We will soon add a detailed tutorial on how to connect the SeaChat AI agent to your Facebook Messenger. Support # Need assistance? Contact us at seachat@seaslt.ai.

item.title: WhatsApp
item.description: Overview # After logging onto SeaChat, you can navigate to “Agent Configuration” -> “Channels” -> “WhatsApp” to add the integration. Stay tuned! We will soon add a detailed tutorial on how to connect the SeaChat AI agent to your WhatsApp. Support # Need assistance? Contact us at seachat@seaslt.ai.
